title: CGV announces ‘La La Land’ tour
text: To commemorate the third anniversary of the local release of “La La Land,” a travel package program titled “La La Land Cinema Tour” was launched for CGV Arthouse club members on Tuesday.The tour consists of visits to spots in Los Angeles that became famous again due to the film. From Dec. 3 to 9, travelers will stop at Griffith Observatory, Hermosa Beach, The Lighthouse Cafe and other iconic places where Sebastian and Mia enjoyed moments together. The tour also includes a one-day free pass to Universal Studios Hollywood.Reservations can be made through Nov. 22. However, the tour will only take place if at least 25 people sign up for it. Those who reserve the package before Oct. 24 will be given a 150,000 won ($125) discount, and a 100,0000 won discount will be given if they reserve their tickets before Nov. 3.The film was beloved by local and international audiences. It took home six Oscars at the 2017 Academy Awards, including Best Original Score, Best Original Screenplay and Best Original Song.By Lee Jae-lim
